pullrequest.title: Send configured S3 keys to options.json when launching a simulator instance

content.raw:
Hi @preyna , thanks for tackling this! 

Do you think you could add checks for the S3 keys to the tests? It would be interesting to test both the case when the keys are found and when they aren't. I think you can follow they way the `machinetypes` are tested in `tests/srcrounds.js`.
content.html:
Hi @preyna , thanks for tackling this!

Do you think you could add checks for the S3 keys to the tests? It would be interesting to test both the case when the keys are found and when they aren't. I think you can follow they way the machinetypes are tested in tests/srcrounds.js.
